actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Compensation, Pension, Insurance and Memorial Affairs.
Executive Comment Requested from Veterans' Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Compensation, Pension, Insurance, and Memorial Affairs

official_title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to permit the next of kin of a deceased veteran to designate the style of flag to be furnished at the burial of such veteran.

summary.text: Permits the next of kin or the close friend or associate who is entitled to receive the flag of a deceased veteran to designate the style of flag, draped or mounted, to be furnished at the burial of such veteran.

titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to permit the next of kin of a deceased veteran to designate the style of flag to be furnished at the burial of such veteran.
